subject: National Invitation Tournament
Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: Baylor turned a 1-point halftime lead into a runaway in the second half, beating San Diego State, and earning the right to keep playing into April.
snippet: Baylor turned a 1-point halftime lead into a runaway in the second half, beating San Diego State, and earning the right to keep playing into April.
